pages.privacy-policy: Elysium Casino Hotel - Privacy Policy Elysium Casino Hotel Home Comfort Facilities Casino Entertainment is waiting For any case Privacy Policy for Elysium Casino Hotel At Elysium Casino Hotel, we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our guests and visitors. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose personal information when you use our website, stay at our hotel, or use our casino services. Information We Collect We collect personal information from you when you provide it to us directly, such as when you make a reservation, register for an account, or use our casino services. The information we collect may include: Name Address Email address Phone number Date of birth Government-issued identification number Credit card information Information about your preferences and interests We may also collect information about your use of our website and services through cookies, web beacons, and other technologies. This information may include: Browser type and version Operating system IP address Device type Location data Web pages you view on our site Links you click on our site The length of time you spend on our site How We Use Your Information We use your personal information to provide you with the services you request, to personalize your experience on our site, and to communicate with you about special offers and promotions. We may also use your information to: Process and confirm your reservations Verify your identity and age Provide you with access to our casino services Respond to your inquiries and requests Send you administrative communications, such as confirmation emails and security alerts Improve our website and services Comply with legal and regulatory requirements Disclosure of Your Information We may disclose your personal information to third parties in the following circumstances: To service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as payment processors, marketing companies, and data analytics providers. To our partners and affiliates, such as airlines, car rental companies, and other hotels, to provide you with additional services and benefits. To comply with legal and regulatory requirements, such as responding to a subpoena or court order. To protect our rights and property, and the rights and property of our guests and visitors. In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of our business. Security of Your Information We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no security measures can be 100% effective, and we cannot guarantee the security of your information. International Users Our website and services are intended for users in the United States. If you are accessing our site from outside the United States, please be aware that your information may be transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States, where our servers are located and our central database is operated. The data protection and privacy laws of the United States may not be as comprehensive as those in your country. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our information practices, please contact us at elysiumcasinohotel@gmail.com. We will do our best to respond to your inquiry promptly and professionally.
